comments:
Hitting the Preview tab on the WPE gives an java.lang.LinkageError exception.
Workaround:
Remove the following set of jars in the plugin folder:
javax.servlet.jsp_2.0.0.v200706191603.jar
javax.servlet_2.4.0.v200706111738.jar
org.apache.commons.el_1.0.0.v200706111724.jar
